mean_cn: n. 不平衡，不均衡，失调
mean_en: a state or condition in which different things do not occur in equal or proper amounts
word_etyma: im不 + balance平衡 → imbalance 不平衡
short_phrase: an imbalance in the legal system
sentence: There is currently an imbalance of stones on the left side.
sentence_trans: 目前左边的石头处于不平衡状态。
